Item.name: Augment Splicer
Item.description: A specialized device based on the gene splicer which facilitates the use of genetic material, EGO Gifts, and body modifications.

Item.name: Portable Infusion Station
Item.description: A specialized research station able to process some of the intricacies of the E.G.O. In other words, it can process not only genetic materials, but E.G.O. Gifts as well. It is also uniquely suited to processing H Corp.'s Boluses due to its support for Enkephalin-infused materials.

Item.name: Melty Eye
Item.description: A strange melty eye dropped by the Blubbering Toad. With proper medical skill it can act as a potent antipsychotic. When used improperly it can cause insanity.

Item.name: Der Freischütz's Pipe
Item.description: A gilded pipe used to calm even a devil's nerves. Smoking this pipe will reduce Insanity caused by Abnormalities as well as Psychosis.

Item.name: Blue Zippo Lighter
Item.description: Useful for lighting ignitable items, but it also grants the user Charge when used.

Item.name: Patrolling Flashlight
Item.description: A high-powered flashlight like this might just blind someone, so be careful where you point it.

Item.name: H Corp. Bolus Base
Item.description: A mixture of genetics and Enkephalin, just waiting to be combined into something greater.
